title: Sebi mulls capping tenure of stock exchange CEOs to maximum two 5-yr terms
content: Sebi is planning to bring in new ownership norms for setting up of stock exchanges as it feels that entry of new players can benefit investors with better product choices and effective cost structures
contentSnippet: Sebi is planning to bring in new ownership norms for setting up of stock exchanges as it feels that entry of new players can benefit investors with better product choices and effective cost structures
